name: Pick It (Grevius Studio)
description:
This game was created for the "Quarantine Jam".

Pick It is a simple addictive game where you have A LOT OF mini character with A LOT OF customization, your objective is to find the right one and click it!

Pretty simple!

In the game you can find 2 bonus characters, you can distinct the bonus one because they have a gold item. One removes some of the characters from the screen, the other one shows to you where is the character that you have to find.

Every feedback is appreciated, let me know if you like my game ;)
